entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:55 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 3:09 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.6°C

Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 92 %
